ValidationRule.description: If a case is closed as unresolved it requires a jira
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Closed - Unresolved'), ISPICKVAL(Root_Cause__c, 'System Issue'), ISPICKVAL(Root_Cause__c,'Bug') ),
OR( Has_JIRA__c = false, ISBLANK(JIRA_Key__c) ),
RecordTypeId = '0128F000000W684QAC', /*Technical Support*/ OR( $UserRole.Name = "Technical Support Manager", $UserRole.Name = "Technical Support Rep" )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Closed - Unresolved, Root Cause: Bug, System Issue, require a JIRA before closing the case.
